title: Julian Edelman | Ep. 136 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Julian Edelman | Ep. 136 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On the latest ALL THE SMOKE episode, Matt and Stak are joined by 3x Super Bowl champ Julian Edelman who takes a deep dive into his legendary NFL football career, and shares amazing stories about Tom Brady, Randy Moss, Gronk and more. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
